lines.p: Bilʹdad the Shuʹhite said in reply:
“Rulership and fearsome might are his;He establishes peace in heaven.

Can his troops be numbered?
Upon whom does his light not rise?
So how can mortal man be righteous before God,Or how can one born of a woman be innocent?
Even the moon is not brightAnd the stars are not pure in his eyes,
How much less so mortal man, who is a maggot,And a son of man, who is a worm!”
